juzs.text: R. These (liter) est proofs this scripture; profound Quran
Certainly those disbelieved wish ili est submitters
Let them mangx gxu ceter blind wishful opini ili do gxi trov out
Ni neniam annihilated any community en accordance kun specif predetermined temp
end any community neniam advanced nor delayed
Ili dir O vi ricev this reminder vi est crazy
Why vi ne bring angxel vi est truthful
Ni ne send angxel specif funkci. Otherwise ne 1 respited
Absolutely ni revealed reminder absolutely ni konfit gxi
Ni send (messengers) vi communities en des preter
Cxiu temp messenger ir them ili ridiculed him
Ni tiel control mens kulp
Consequently ili ne kred en him. This est sistem ekde generaci
Eben se ni opened por them gate into cxiel which ili grimp
Ili dir Our okul tromp. Ni sorcx
Ni ej galaxies en des cxiel, ornam gxi beholders
Ni gard gxi cxiu rejected diabl
any da them sneaks auxskult tre projectile vol pel him dors
As por ter ni konstru gxi ej gxi stabilizers (mont) ni kresk gxi perfekt balance de cxio
Ni far gxi habitable vi kaj creatures vi ne do proviz por
tie est nothing ke ni ne own infinite amounts thereof. Ni send gxi down preciz mezur
Ni send vent pollinators kauxz akv ven cxiel vi trink! Otherwise vi ne keep gxi palatable
est ni control life death ni est ultimate inheritors
Ni fully kon those vi advance ni fully kon those regress
Your Lord surely summon them. Li est Sagx Omniscient
Ni kre human est agx kot potter's clay
As por jinns ni kre them antaux ke, blazing fajr
Your Lord dir al angxel mi kre human est agx kot potter's clay
Once mi perfekt him blov him el My spirit vi fal prostrate antaux him
angxel fal prostrate all da them
Iblis (Satan). Li rifuz est prostrators
Li dir O Iblis (Satan) why est vi ne prostrators
Li dir mi ne est prostrate human est Vi kre agx kot potter's clay
Li dir Do vi get vi banished
Vi incurred My condemnation Tag Judgment
Li dir My Lord respite me tag ili resurrected
Li dir Vi respited
Gxis specified tag temp
Li dir My Lord ekde Vi hav willed ke mi ir astray mi surely entice them ter; mi send them all astray
those among Your worshipers devoted absolutely Vi sol
Li dir This est legx est inviolable
Vi ne hav potenc My servants! Vi nur hav potenc strayers sekv vi
Infer awaits them all
Gxi hav 7 gates Each gate get specif akci de them
As por righteous ili gxu gxarden printemp
Enter therein peaceful secure
Ni remove all jealousy their kor. Like 1 famili ili est adjacent furnishings
Neniam vol ili sufer any fatigue therein; neniam vol ili evicted therefrom
Inform My servants mi est Forgiver Merciful
Kaj ke My retribution est plej painful retribution
Inform them Abraham's gast
When ili entered his kvartal ili dir Pac. Li dir Ni est apprehensive pri vi
Ili dir ne est apprehensive. Ni hav bon news vi enlightened fil
Li dir Kiel vi don me such bon news when mi est tial old? Vi ankoraux don me this bon news
Ili dir bon news ni don vi est prav; do ne despair
Li dir Neniom despairs his Lord's mercy escept strayers
Li dir Ki est your misi O messengers
Ili dir Ni depesx kulp popol
As por Lot's famili ni sav them all
Ne his wife; sxi destin est kun des doomed
messengers ir Lot's town
Li dir Vi est unknown popol
Ili dir Ni bring vi ki ili dub
Ni bring vi truth; ni est truthful
Vi sorb your famili nokt. Rest them far sure ke neniom da vi rigard dors! Ir rekt as komand
Ni liver him this komand those popol est annihilated en des maten
Popol urb ven joyfully
Li dir These est my gast; ne embarrass me
Tim DI ne fi me
Ili dir ni ne enjoin vi Did el kontakt anyone
Li dir Here est my daughters vi dev
Sed alas ili totally blind their lust
Consequently disaster strik them en des maten
Ni torn upside down dusx them devastating rok
This est lecion those posed intelligence
This cxiam est sistem
This est sign believers
Popol lign ankaux est transgressors
Consequently ni vengx them kaj ambaux communities fully dokument
Popol Al-Hijr disbelieved messengers
Ni don them our revelations ili disregarded them
Ili uz carve secure hejm mont
disaster hit them en des maten
ki ili hoarded ne help them
Ni ne kre heavens ter cxio them specif purpose end mond ven tial trakt them benign neglect
Your Lord est Creator Omniscient
Ni don vi 7 par great Quran
Est jxaluz de ki ni bestowed ali (messengers) ne saddened disbelievers) lower your wing believers
Proklam mi est manifest warner
Ni deal kun dividers
Ili akcept Quran nur partially
Per your Lord ni question them all
Pri cxio ili done
Do port mend don al vi disregard idol worshipers
Ni sxpar vi mockers
who set another di DI! Ili do gxi surely trov out
Ni kon plen put ke vi annoyed their utterances
Vi kant lauxd your Lord est prostrators
worship your Lord en ord al ating certainty
(Di ordon jam issued cxio jam skrib) tial ne rush gxi! Li glor; plej Alt far super any idols ili set
Li send angxel revelations port His ordon whomever Li chooses His servants Vi predik tie ne est ali di Me Vi reverence Me
Li kre heavens ter specif purpose Li est mult tro Alt far super any idols ili set
Li kre human tiny gut tiam li turn into ardent opponent
Li kre livestock vi proviz vi warmth many ali benefits tro as food
Ili ankaux proviz vi luks your leisure kaj when vi vojagx
Ili port your loads land ti vi ne reach great hardship. Surely your Lord est Compassionate Merciful
(Li kre) cxeval mul donkeys vi rajd kaj luks. Additionally Li kre ki vi ne kon
DI pint paths wrong UNU. Se Li willed Li direkt all da vi
Li send cxiel akv por your trink kresk arb your benefit
Kun gxi Li kresk vi crops oliv dat palm grapes all kinds da frukt. This est (sufficient) proof popol pens
Li commits en your service nokt tag tro as sun lun. Ankaux stel committed His ordon. These est (sufficient) proofs popol kompren
Kaj (Li kre) por vi ter ajx de various kolor. This est (sufficient) proof popol pren heed
Li committed mar dejxor vi; vi mangx el gxi tender viand ekstrakt jewelry vi wear Vi seg sxip roaming gxi your commercial benefits vi streb His bounties vi est appreciative
Li ej stabilizers (mont) ter lest gxi tumbles vi tro as river roads vi direkt
landmarks ankaux as stel; al uz navigation
est 1 who kre 1 who ne kre? Vi tuj pren heed
Vi count di blessings vi possibly ne encompass them. DI est Forgiver Merciful
DI kon whatever vi conceal whatever vi deklar
As por idols ili set DI ili ne kre anything; ili kre
Ili est dead ne alive ili ne hav ide kiel when ili resurrected
Your di est 1 di. As por those ne kred en Hereafter their kor denying ili est arrogant
Absolutely DI kon cxio ili conceal cxio ili deklar. Li ne am those est arrogant
When ili pet Ki do vi opini da these revelations el your Lord ili dir Tales el preter
Ili ten responsible por their pek Tag Resurrection all da them ankaux al pek de all those ili misled their ignorance. Ki miserable load
Others them schemed en des preter, consequently DI detru their mason fundament kauxz tegment fal them. retribution strik them when ili malplej expected
Tiam Tag Resurrection Li disgrace them pet Kie est My partners vi set Me opposed Me por their sake? Those ben kun knowledge dir Hodiaux fi mizer befallen disbelievers
Angxel put them death sxtat de wronging their anim! Est when ili finally submit dir Ni ne do anything wrong Jes ja! DI EST fully aware da CXIO VI done
Do enter gates Infer wherein vi abide forever Ki miserable destiny por arrogant unu
As por righteous when ili pet Ki do vi opini da these revelations el your Lord ili dir Bon. those plumb righteous life happiness; abode Hereafter est eben bon! Ki blissful abode por des righteous
Gxarden Eden rezerv them wherein river flu. Ili hav anything ili wish therein. DI TIEL REKOMPENC DES righteous
Angxel terminate their viv en sxtat righteousness dir Pac est vi! Enter Paradise (tuj) rekompenc your works
Ili waiting angxel est ven them aux your Lord's judgment ven pas? Those antaux them did sam ajx! DI EST UNU wronged them; ILI est UNU wronged their own ANIM
Ili incurred consequences their evil works tre ajx ili ridiculed ven haunt them

idol worshipers dir Hav DI willed ni ne worship any idols Him nor would our parents Nor would ni prohibit anything His prohibitions. Those antaux them done des sam messengers Can anything do liver komplet message
Ni send messenger cxiu community dir Vi worship DI evit idolatry. Subsequently kelk est direkt per DI while others committed straying Roam ter not consequences rejectors
Ne materi kiel hard vi pen direkt them DI ne direkt des unu Li committed straying Tiel ne 1 help them
Ili jxur solemnly DI "DI testament ne resurrect dead Absolutely such est His inviolable promes plej popol ne kon
Li tiam pint everyone all ajx ili disput let those disbelieved kon ti ili est liars
Al hav anything done ni simply dir al Est gxi est
Those emigrated DI ili persekut ni surely far gxi them generously en this life recompense Hereafter est eben greater ili nur kon
This est because ili steadfastly persevere en their Lord ili fid
Ni ne send vi hom ni inspir. Pet those kon scripture vi ne kon
Ni proviz them proofs scriptures. Ni send down vi this message proklam popol cxio send down them perhaps ili reflect
those scheme evil schemes garanti ke DI testament ne kauxz ter Did al glut them ke retribution ne ven them when ili malpli expect gxi
Gxi strik them while ili est asleep ili neniam escape
Gxi strik them while ili fearfully expecting gxi! Your Lord est Compassionate Merciful
Ili ne seg all ajx hav kre DI? Their ombr surround them tre las en total submission al DI kaj volont
Al DI prostrates cxio heavens cxio sur ter! - Cxiu creature - Kaj tial do angxel; malplej arrogance
Ili reverence their Lord alt super them ili do ki ili komand do
DI PROKLAM NE worship 2 DI tie est NUR UNU DI! Vi reverence Me sol
Him aparten cxio heavens ter do religi devoted absolutely Him sol! Vi worship DI
Any ben vi gxu est DI. sed whenever vi incur any adversity vi tuj plend Him
as baldaux as Li relieves your affliction kelk da vi revert idol worship
Let them disbelieve ki ni don them! Ir ahead gxu temporarily; vi do gxi surely trov out
Ili designate idols ili set ignorance akci provisions ni bestow them. Per DI vi ten accountable por your innovations
Ili ecx asign daughters DI Li glor while ili prefer themselves ki ili like
When unu de them gets beb girl his vizagx igx darkened overwhelming grief
Hont li kasx popol mav news don him. Li ecx ponders should li keep beb grudgingly bury her en polv! Miserable ja est their judgment
Those ne kred en Hereafter set mav ekzempl while al DI aparten plej sublime ekzempl! Li est Almighty plej Sagx
Se DI pun popol their transgressions Li annihilated cxiu creature ter. Li respites them por specif predetermined temp Once their interim ends ili ne delay gxi 1 hor nor advance gxi
Ili ascribe al DI ki ili dislike themselves tiam utter mensog their own lang ili est righteous! Sen any dub ili incurred Infer ili ribel
Per DI ni send (messengers) communities vi diabl ornam their works their okul. Consequently li est nun their lord ili incurred painful retribution
Ni revealed this scripture vi pint them ki ili disput proviz guidance mercy popol who kred
DI SEND CXIEL AKV revive LAND GXI MORT! This est (sufficient) proof popol auxd
En livestock tie est lecion vi ni proviz vi drink their bellies El midst de digest food sang vi get pur melk delicious por drinkers
Kaj frukt de daktil palm grapes vi produkt intoxicants tro bon provisions This est (sufficient) proof popol kompren
your Lord inspir abel cxarpent hejm mont arb hives ili cxarpent vi
Tiam mangx all frukt sekv desegn your Lord precisely El their bellies ven drink different kolor wherein tie healing popol! This est (sufficient) proof popol reflect
DI KRE VI TIAM LI terminates your viv Li lets kelk da vi viv oldest agx, nur trov out ti tie est lim al knowledge ili akir. DI est Omniscient Omnipotent
DI HAV proviz por kelk da VI plur than others! Those don suficx neniam don their properties their subordinates extent far them partners Ili Would don up di blessings
Di far vi spouses yourselves kaj produkt vi el your spouses infan grandchildren proviz vi bon provisions Ili kred en falsehood turn unappreciative de di blessings
Ili worship DI ki ne posed provisions por them heavens nor sur ter nor proviz them anything
Do ne cite ekzempl DI; DI kon while vi ne kon
DI cites EKZEMPL SKLAV owned est totally powerless kompar al UNU whom NI BEN BON provisions EL LI DON charity secretly publicly. Ili est egal? Lauxd est al DI plej de them ne kon

Di cites ekzempl 2 hom unu est dumb lacks ability do anything est totally dependent his mastr! - whichever voj li directs him li ne produkt anything bon. Li egal al unu regul justice est direkt dekstr path
Al DI aparten future de heavens ter! As far as Li koncern end de mond (Hor) est blink okul for eben closer DI est Omnipotent
DI brought VI your mothers' bellies KON nothing LI DON VI auxd eyesight CERB VI est appreciative
Ili ne seg bird Do committed flug atmosphere cxiel? Neniom hold them en des aer DI. This est (sufficient) proof popol kred
Di proviz por vi stationary hejm vi viv. Li proviz por vi portable hejm far kasx livestock vi uz them when vi vojagx when vi sald down El their lan pelt har vi far furnishings luks awhile
Di proviz por vi shade ajx Li kre proviz por vi sxirm mont proviz por vi garments protekt vi hejt garments ke protekt when vi batal en milit! Li tiel perfekt His blessings vi ke vi submit
Ili ankoraux turn tiam your pland misi est klar delivery (de message)
Ili fully recognize di blessings tiam deny them; majority de them est disbelievers
(Tag ven when ni raise el cxiu community witness tiam those disbelieved ne permes parol) nor vol ili pretekst
Once those transgressed seg retribution est tro late gxi ne commuted them nor vol ili respited
Kaj when those committed idol worship vid their idols ili dir Our Lord these est idols ni set Vi. idols tiam confront them dir Vi est liars
Ili totally submit DI tag idols ili invent disown them
Those disbelieve repel path DI ni eg their retribution adding plur retribution their transgressions
Tag ven when ni raise el cxiu community witness el them bring vi as witness these popol! Ni revealed vi this libr proviz explanations cxio guidance mercy bon news submitters
DI ADVOKAT justice charity RELATIV. Li forbids evil vice transgression. Li enlightens vi ke vi pren heed
(Vi fulfill your covenant DI when vi far such covenant Vi ne violate oaths jxur Di) port them vi far DI guarantor vi! DI kon CXIO VI do

Ne est knitter unravels her fort trik into piles flimsy yarn This est your ekzempl vi abuse oaths sorb avantagx da unu another 1 grup est larger than ali DI tiel puts vi test Li surely montr vi Tag Resurrection cxio vi disput
Hav DI willed Li far vi 1 congregation! Li send astray whoever chooses ir astray Li direkt whoever wishes direkt! Vi surely est pet pri cxio vi done
(Ne abuse oaths vi lest vi slide dors hav fort foothold tiam vi incur mizer! Such est consequence de repelling el path DI setting mav ekzempl;) vi incur terrible retribution
Ne vend your oaths short DI! Ki DI posed est far put vi se vi nur kon
ki vi posed kur out ki DI posed last forever Ni surely rekompenc those who steadfastly persevere ni recompense them their righteous works
Anyone works righteousness vir female while kred ni surely grant them felicx life en this mond ni surely pag them their plen recompense Tag Judgment their righteous works
When vi leg Quran vi streb rifugx DI el Satan des rejected
Li ne hav potenc over those kred fid their Lord
His potenc lim those choose him as their mastr those who choose him their di
When ni substitute 1 revelation en met de another DI est fully aware da ki Li reveals ili dir Vi far this Ja plej de them ne kon
Dir Holy Spirit brought gxi your Lord truthfully assure those kred proviz beacon bon news submitters
Ni est fully aware ili dir human est instru him! lang source ili hint je est non- Arabic this est perfekt Arabic lang
Surely those ne kred en di revelations DI ne direkt them. Ili incurred painful retribution
Nur unu fabricate false doctrines est those ne kred en di revelations; ili est efektiv liars
Those disbelieve DI akir faith igx fully kontent disbelief incurred wrath el DI! Nur unu al pretekst est those forced profess disbelief while their kor est plen de faith
This est ili don priority this life over Hereafter DI ne direkt such disbelieving popol
Those est unu whom DI sigel their kor their auxd their eyesight. Consequently ili ceter unaware
Sen dub ili est losers Hereafter
As por those emigrate persecution tiam ad strive steadfastly persevere your Lord all this est Forgiver Merciful
Tag ven when cxiu anim serv its own advokat cxiu anim pag fully whatever gxi done malplej injustice

DI cites EKZEMPL community UZ est secure prosperous provisions ven GXI EL CXIE. Tiam gxi torn unappreciative de di blessings. Consequently DI kauxz them gust hardships de starvation insecurity. Such est requital ki ili did
messenger ir them them ili rejected him. Consequently retribution strik them por their transgression
Do vi mangx di provisions cxio est lawful bon est appreciative de di blessings vi worship Him sol
(Li nur prohibits vi dead best sang viand pork food which dedicx DI. 1 forced mangx these) sen est deliberate malic tiam DI est Forgiver Merciful
Vi ne utter mensog your own lang sxtat This est lawful this est unlawful fabricate mensog atribu them DI! Surely those fabricate mensog atribu them al DI testament neniam sukces
Ili gxu briefly tiam sufer painful retribution
Jud ni prohibited ki ni narrated vi previously. Ne est us wronged them; ili est unu wronged their own anim
sed as regards those fal pek ignorance tiam pent thereafter reform your Lord this done est Forgiver Merciful
Abraham est ja exemplary vanguard his submission al DI monotheist who neniam worshipped idols
Li est appreciative de His Lord's blessings Li chose him direkt him rekt path
Ni granted him happiness en this life en Hereafter li est kun des righteous
Tiam ni inspir vi (Muhammad) sekv religi Abraham monotheist; li neniam est idol worshiper
Sabbath dekret nur those ended disput gxi (Jud Christians)! Your Lord est Unu jugx them Tag Resurrection their disput
Vi invit path your Lord kun wisdom kind enlightenment kaj debat them bon possible manier! Your Lord kon put who hav strayed His path Li kon put who direkt unu
Kaj se vi pun vi inflict ekvivalent punishment. Vi resort al pacienc instead da revenge gxi est put pacient unu
Vi resort pacienc - your pacienc est attainable nur di help. Ne grieve them ne annoyed their schemes
DI est those PLUMB righteous life those est charitable
